messages: 9ed5df709f4498d8eee49426aafe1664 (16:37): can someone point me to a guide to how I can troubleshoot and possible replace my fans/temperature guages?
9ed5df709f4498d8eee49426aafe1664 (16:39): well i'm not sure if my system is actually too hot or if the thermometers are misreading
9ed5df709f4498d8eee49426aafe1664 (16:40): i'm okay with the software side of things but hardware is something i need to learn :)
1becfb88fded39b9b7b556e1ed9b611b (16:40): you might beable to 'calibrate' temp sensors but replace them, well a lot are surface mount or even on-die :(
9ed5df709f4498d8eee49426aafe1664 (16:41): right well, according to my BIOS, only one fan (the system fan) is operating
9ed5df709f4498d8eee49426aafe1664 (16:42): i don't like it that hot :)
1becfb88fded39b9b7b556e1ed9b611b (16:42): try setting all the fans to be full on in the bios
9ed5df709f4498d8eee49426aafe1664 (16:42): HD0 49C HD1 46C and gen syst temp 52C
9ed5df709f4498d8eee49426aafe1664 (16:43): I'm running SpeedFan which tells me that  Fans 1 and 3 are off, while no 2 is running at 2722rpm
9ed5df709f4498d8eee49426aafe1664 (16:43): but I don't know what's what :D
9ed5df709f4498d8eee49426aafe1664 (16:44): ok, giant big one pointing directly to mboard is on
1becfb88fded39b9b7b556e1ed9b611b (16:44): shuld be on on the CPU heat sink
9ed5df709f4498d8eee49426aafe1664 (16:45): the other one, would that be in the power supply?
9ed5df709f4498d8eee49426aafe1664 (16:46): i know these are newbie questions - i feel embarrassed asking
9ed5df709f4498d8eee49426aafe1664 (16:47): whenever I ask the system to do anything remotely strenuous, the temp reaches 110C and the system cuts out :)
1becfb88fded39b9b7b556e1ed9b611b (16:48): what temps does the bios give?
9ed5df709f4498d8eee49426aafe1664 (16:48): i'd have to go back to look now, but CPU temp is around 90C and syst around 50C
9ed5df709f4498d8eee49426aafe1664 (16:49): i know enough to know it's hot
623dd926daeac8b8f677b3848f119907 (16:49): are you sure the heatsink and the cpu are making contact?
9ed5df709f4498d8eee49426aafe1664 (16:49): well it's been fine for a year
623dd926daeac8b8f677b3848f119907 (16:49): maybe the thermal paste has dried up or walked away
9ed5df709f4498d8eee49426aafe1664 (16:49): this job is prob out of my hands eh?
1becfb88fded39b9b7b556e1ed9b611b (16:50): at 110C that core should be dead
9ed5df709f4498d8eee49426aafe1664 (16:51): so I know, what should I be aiming for?
9ed5df709f4498d8eee49426aafe1664 (16:51): i don't plan on letting it reach such a high temp again
9ed5df709f4498d8eee49426aafe1664 (16:51): would the local comp shop be able to fix something like this?
